author: timbeiko
content:
**Next ACDE is in ~23.5h, May 25, 14:00 UTC**
Local timestamp: <t:1685023200:f>
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/781
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/jJvS6QjhPlM
Zoom: to be shared here prior to the call

author: timbeiko
content:
Two noteworthy things on the agenda for client teams to prepare for:

(1) we'll be going over Dedaub's impact analysis of SELFDESTRUCT removal, which you can read here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HDbym5YOoYj63xswMAwvt5Psh4JaI0biY06b6ZvYV2s/edit

(2) we'll try and (hopefully!) finalize EIP inclusion for Cancun - if teams have EIPs they feel strongly about, now's the time to voice that opinion. The list of currently proposed EIPs is available here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/cancun-network-upgrade-meta-thread/12060
